thread.title: BRIEF-Flowers Foods Says Issued Trade Notice Informing Some Third-Party Customers Of Voluntary Recall Of Unbaked Frozen Biscuits

title: BRIEF-Flowers Foods Says Issued Trade Notice Informing Some Third-Party Customers Of Voluntary Recall Of Unbaked Frozen Biscuits

organizations.name: third-party customers of voluntary recall of unbaked frozen biscuits reuters staff

text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Flowers Foods Inc:
* FLOWERS FOODS SAYS ON JAN 4,ISSUED TRADE NOTICE INFORMING SOME THIRD-PARTY CUSTOMERS OF VOLUNTARY RECALL OF UNBAKED (RAW) FROZEN BISCUITS - SEC FILING
* FLOWERS FOODS - ‍ISSUED RECALL BECAUSE OF POSSIBLE CONTAMINATION WITH LISTERIA MONOCYTOGENES​
* FLOWERS FOODS INC - ‍RECALL IS NOT ANTICIPATED TO BE FINANCIALLY MATERIAL; NO ILLNESSES HAVE BEEN REPORTED​ RELATED TO RECALLED PRODUCT Source text: ( bit.ly/2ARf1uD ) Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
